snippet.title: Terminus - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Terminus is available in Early Access on Steam!
Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1534980

Terminus is a turn-based roguelike survival game set in a zombie apocalypse. The zombie outbreak strikes, and you seek out the Terminus where survivors gathered. Survive the hunger, the cold, and the zombies to arrive at the Terminus!

#Terminus #EarlyAccess #Steam
